item.title: Need help on 6 things
item.dc:creator: @Death31 Death31
item.description:
@Death31 wrote:

Ok I have a few questions,

First question, how do I change what you wear when you first come into my server? I was told to go into player.java and change it here:

//Giving the player an unique look /*playerEquipment[playerHat]=Item.randomHat(); playerEquipment[playerCape]=Item.randomCape(); playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=Item.randomAmulet(); playerEquipment[playerChest]=Item.randomBody(); playerEquipment[playerShield]=Item.randomShield(); playerEquipment[playerLegs]=Item.randomLegs(); playerEquipment[playerHands]=Item.randomGloves(); playerEquipment[playerFeet]=Item.randomBoots(); playerEquipment[playerRing]=Item.randomRing(); playerEquipment[playerArrows]=Item.randomArrows(); playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1275;*/
But it only says random and not the ID so im not sureâ€¦

Second,
How do I make a quest?

Third,
How do I put in Premium member(or whatever its called) so that u can only wield or wear a certain thing?
I was thinking on putting Premium on certain quests, places and on some weapons/armour.

Fourth,
How do I make portals?

Fifth,
How do I put ancients in the tab at the bottom left hand corner?

Sixth,
How do I put teles in the emotes?

Read full topic
